metadata.title: CVE-2016-5091 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Extbase in TYPO3 4.3.0 before 6.2.24, 7.x before 7.6.8, and 8.1.1 allowsremote attackers to obtain sensitive information or possibly executearbitrary code via a crafted Extbase action.

criterions.comment: typo3-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
